73 /*========== Test Cases =====================================================*/
74 
75 void testIO_SetPinDirectionToOutput(void) {
76  volatile uint32_t registerValue = 1u;
77  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(IO_SetPinDirectionToOutput(NULL_PTR, 0u));
78  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(IO_SetPinDirectionToOutput(&registerValue, MCU_LARGEST_PIN_NUMBER + 1u));
79 
80  /* 0 -> 1 */
81  IO_SetPinDirectionToOutput(&registerValue, 0u);
82  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(1u, registerValue);
83 
84  /* 1 -> 1 */
85  IO_SetPinDirectionToOutput(&registerValue, 0u);
86  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(1u, registerValue);
87 }
88 
89 void testIO_SetPinDirectionToInput(void) {
90  volatile uint32_t registerValue = 1u;
91  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(IO_SetPinDirectionToInput(NULL_PTR, 0u));
92  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(IO_SetPinDirectionToInput(&registerValue, MCU_LARGEST_PIN_NUMBER + 1u));
93 
94  /* 1 -> 0 */
95  IO_SetPinDirectionToInput(&registerValue, 0u);
96  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0u, registerValue);
97 
98  /* 0 -> 0 */
99  IO_SetPinDirectionToInput(&registerValue, 0u);
100  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0u, registerValue);
101 }
102 
103 void testIO_PinSet(void) {
104  volatile uint32_t registerValue = 0u;
105  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(IO_PinSet(NULL_PTR, 0u));
106  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(IO_PinSet(&registerValue, MCU_LARGEST_PIN_NUMBER + 1u));
107 
108  /* 0 -> 1 */
109  IO_PinSet(&registerValue, 0u);
110  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(1u, registerValue);
111 
112  /* 1 -> 1 */
113  IO_PinSet(&registerValue, 0u);
114  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(1u, registerValue);
115 }
116 
117 void testIO_PinReset(void) {
118  volatile uint32_t registerValue = 1u;
119  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(IO_PinReset(NULL_PTR, 0u));
120  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(IO_PinReset(&registerValue, MCU_LARGEST_PIN_NUMBER + 1u));
121 
122  /* 1 -> 0 */
123  IO_PinReset(&registerValue, 0u);
124  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0u, registerValue);
125 
126  /* 0 -> 0 */
127  IO_PinReset(&registerValue, 0u);
128  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0u, registerValue);
129 }
130 
131 void testIO_PinGet(void) {
132  volatile uint32_t registerValue = 1u;
133  /* invalid argument tests */
134  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(IO_PinGet(NULL_PTR, 0u));
135  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(IO_PinGet(&registerValue, MCU_LARGEST_PIN_NUMBER + 1u));
136 
137  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(STD_PIN_LOW, IO_PinGet(&registerValue, 1u));
138  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(STD_PIN_HIGH, IO_PinGet(&registerValue, 0u));
139 }
